MintAsset(string,uint256,uint256).details: Mints a new intellectual property asset.

getAssetDetails(uint256).details: Returns the details of an asset.

getAssetsListedForSale().details: Returns the list of asset IDs listed for sale.

getTransactionCount(address).details: Returns the number of transactions initiated by a user.

getUserAssets().details: Returns the asset IDs owned by the caller.
